name: My silly little smash clone (Smash Bash 2)
name_original: My silly little smash clone (Smash Bash 2)
description:
Just a small passion project I've been making with the Platform Fighter Engine by Yosi! 

Don't expect any level of quality from this, it's very buggy and incomplete, it's just something I've been doing for fun in my spare time.

I haven't made any of the characters (Except Piti), all the sprites are also ripped from other games and so is the music.

That being said I found it to be fun enough to upload here, I MIGHT add an online mode though not likely.  If you want to play it online with a friend I recommend using something like Parsec

Hope you enjoy!

Characters:

Piti - A simple all-rounder. Decent range, combos, kill power, projectile, etc.

Reimu - A rushdown combo character. The best combo potential in the game with good kill confirms at the cost of having a very exploitable recovery and slow movement speed

Kirby - Projectile spam zoner. Excels at annoying the opponent and getting them offstage to spike them. He is also the smallest and lightest character, has 5 jumps instead of a recovery move.

Ness - All-rounder with great projectiles and decent combos, while being relatively light and having a poor recovery

Adelaine - Decent zoner with great kill power while also being slow and heavy

Android 18 - A grappler with great damage, knockback and combos. Has pretty short range and slow speed but with a few good movement options

Cuphead - Semi-rushdown semi-projectile spammer combination. Relatively light and mediocre range

Suwako - Has great range and a good projectile at the cost of her size and weight. Can triple jump and has tricky movement options
